WHO SAFE CHILDBIRTH CHECKLIST IMPLEMENTATION GUIDE  8  
BACKGROUND AND OVERVIEW
Childbirth is a complex process with many necessary, sometimes difficult, sometimes  
complicated steps that ensure both the mother and her newborn child receive the safest 
care possible. Most people find it difficult to simply remember all of the relevant information; 
actually performing all the steps correctly and in the correct o
